You imbue your weapon with the purifying light of the Force. As part of the action used to cast this power, you must make a melee weapon attack against one creature within your reach, otherwise the power fails. On a hit, the target suffers the attack's normal effects, and it becomes wreathed in a glowing barrier of force energy until the start of your next turn. If the target willingly moves before then, it immediately takes [[/r 1d8]] force damage, and the power ends.

This power's damage increases when you reach higher levels. At 5th level, the melee attack deals an extra [[/r 1d8]] force damage to the target, and the damage the target takes for moving increases to [[/r 2d8]]. Both damage rolls increase by [[/r 1d8]] at 11th level and 17th level.
